alert.note: Alert for Natrona (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 10 at 3:18PM MDT until September 10 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Natrona County in central Wyoming... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 317 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles west of Teapot Rock, which is also 28 miles northwest of Casper, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Antelope Hills, Homa Hills and Bar Nunn. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 195 and 215. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
